description: The Villa of Hadrian (Villa Adriana in Italian) is a sprawling archaeological complex at Tivoli, Italy. The villa complex was designed and used by the emperor Hadrian in the second century A.D.
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: Hadrian’s Villa/Villa Adriana
